analyzed: @176b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tri shatti aa badha sha /
analyzed: tri shatti aa badha sha /
translated: Trishatavada

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa //
analyzed: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa //
translated: The Thirty Expressed

original: jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord AvalokitesvaraüîΩThe vajra-holder, Brahma, Indra, and the topknot,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs dbang gtsug / chu skyes che dbus 'jig rten mgon //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs dbang gtsug / chu skyes che dbus 'jig rten mgon //
translated: In the middle of the great lotus, the lord of the world,

original: 'od zer rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: 'od zer rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //

original: ae ma dri gsum dag mdzad rmad //
analyzed: ae ma dri gsum dag mdzad rmad //

original: bstan pa'i lus ni ri bo 'dra //
analyzed: bstan pa'i lus ni ri bo 'dra //
translated: The body of the teaching is like a mountain,

original: spros bral sems ni nam mkha' ste //
analyzed: spros bral sems ni nam mkha' ste //
translated: The mind free from elaborations is space,

original: g-yon pa'i sems ni rlung rgyun bcings //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i sems ni rlung rgyun bcings //

original: tshul 'dis rnal 'byor bdag legs grol //
analyzed: tshul 'dis rnal 'byor bdag legs grol //
translated: By this method, I, the yogi, am well liberated.

original: yid ni khyab 'jug nam mkha' ste //
analyzed: yid ni khyab 'jug nam mkha' ste //
translated: The mind is Vishnu, the sky,

original: 'khor lo lnga yi rang bzhin lus //
analyzed: 'khor lo lnga yi rang bzhin lus //

original: srog rtsol nyi ma zla ba gnyis //
analyzed: srog rtsol nyi ma zla ba gnyis //

original: bde chen rdo rje'i zhags pas 'ching //
analyzed: bde chen rdo rje'i zhags pas 'ching //

original: dri ma lnga ni lnga yis spyong //
analyzed: dri ma lnga ni lnga yis spyong //
translated: The five stains are purified by the five.

original: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the three, body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag ma bcos skye ba med //
analyzed: de dag ma bcos skye ba med //
translated: Those are unfabricated and unborn.

original: ae ma 'di ni bsgom bya gang //
analyzed: ae ma 'di ni bsgom bya gang //
translated: Ah! This is the object of meditation.

original: rgya mtsho'i snying po me 'bar bas //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i snying po me 'bar bas //
translated: The essence of the ocean is a blazing fire,

original: ri rab srog shing shing rta brgyud //
analyzed: ri rab srog shing shing rta brgyud //
translated: the axis of Mount Meru is a chariot axle,

original: tshangs dbang rtse nas char rgyun 'bab //
analyzed: tshangs dbang rtse nas char rgyun 'bab //
translated: the peak of BrahmƒÅ is a rain cloud.

original: thabs kyis thabs dal de @177a * //
analyzed: thabs kyis thabs dal de @177a * //
translated: Look at the method of that method.

original: la ltos // gang ma rig pa de stong nyid //
analyzed: la ltos // gang ma rig pa de stong nyid //
translated: That which is ignorance is emptiness.

original: kun nas dkris pa bde ba'i tshal //
analyzed: kun nas dkris pa bde ba'i tshal //
translated: The entanglements are a pleasure grove.

original: zhe sdang 'bar bas 'od gsal che //
analyzed: zhe sdang 'bar bas 'od gsal che //
translated: The blazing of hatred is great illumination.

original: lha mchog mi de gang gis bcings //
analyzed: lha mchog mi de gang gis bcings //
translated: By whom is the supreme god bound?

original: lte ba'i mar mes mun pa bsal //üîΩsnying gar shes rab padma rgyas //
analyzed: lte ba'i mar mes mun pa bsal // snying gar shes rab padma rgyas //
translated: The lamp of the navel clears away darkness.üîΩAt the heart, the lotus of wisdom opens.

original: spyi gtsug ye shes bde chen 'dzag /
analyzed: spyi gtsug ye shes bde chen 'dzag /
translated: At the crown, the bliss of wisdom drips.

original: da ni rang lus dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: da ni rang lus dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: Now, one‚Äôs body is accomplished.

original: rtsa gsum 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dbus //
analyzed: rtsa gsum 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dbus //
translated: In the center of the gathering of the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s and cakras,

original: bde chen dangs ma'i thig le gnas //
analyzed: bde chen dangs ma'i thig le gnas //
translated: the bindu of the pure essence of great bliss exists.

original: de dbus rnam par mi rtog pa //
analyzed: de dbus rnam par mi rtog pa //
translated: In the center of that, nonconceptuality

original: ye shes mig gcig dri med nyid //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri med nyid //
translated: is the stainless, single eye of wisdom.

original: gzung 'dzin mun par rtogs pa'i 'od //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin mun par rtogs pa'i 'od //
translated: The light of the realization of the darkness of subject and object

original: nam mkha' la ni nyi shar bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni nyi shar bzhin //
translated: is like the sun rising in the sky.

original: der yang mi gnas gzhan du'ang min //
analyzed: der yang mi gnas gzhan du'ang min //
translated: It does not exist there, nor anywhere else.

original: kye ho shin tu zab pa'i gnas //
analyzed: kye ho shin tu zab pa'i gnas //
translated: Oh! The extremely profound place,

original: 'jig rten thams cad nam mkhas bcings //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad nam mkhas bcings //
translated: all worlds are held by space.

original: nam mkha' de yi sprin gyis bsgribs //
analyzed: nam mkha' de yi sprin gyis bsgribs //
translated: Space is obscured by clouds in it.

original: gang tshe rtog pa'i sprin dag pa //
analyzed: gang tshe rtog pa'i sprin dag pa //
translated: When the clouds of conceptualization are purified,

original: de tshe 'di la ci zhig snang //
analyzed: de tshe 'di la ci zhig snang //
translated: what appears to it at that time?

original: sgyu mas sgyu ma'i grong khyer bcom //
analyzed: sgyu mas sgyu ma'i grong khyer bcom //
translated: An illusion destroys the illusory city.

original: sems kyis sems ni slu ba ste //
analyzed: sems kyis sems ni slu ba ste //
translated: The mind deceives the mind.üîΩFrom here, I, like one, know the undeceived.

original: 'di nas bdag 'dras slu med rig / ae ma ho ae ma bla ma'i drin //
analyzed: 'di nas bdag 'dras slu med rig / ae ma ho ae ma bla ma'i drin //
translated: Amazing! Amazing! The guru's kindness.

original: 'og ni las kyi 'khor los bsngams //
analyzed: 'og ni las kyi 'khor los bsngams //
translated: Below, it is bound by the wheel of karma.

original: bar ni rdo rje'i mdud pas bcings //
analyzed: bar ni rdo rje'i mdud pas bcings //
translated: In the middle, it is bound by the knot of the vajra.

original: steng du yi ge gyen du bsgyur //
analyzed: steng du yi ge gyen du bsgyur //
translated: Above, the syllable is turned upward.

original: thabs ni bdag gis rang la rnyed //
analyzed: thabs ni bdag gis rang la rnyed //
translated: The method is found by oneself.

original: lus ni ri bo 'dra byas la //
analyzed: lus ni ri bo 'dra byas la //
translated: Having made the body like a mountain,

original: ngag ni rlung rgyun lta bur bsngams //
analyzed: ngag ni rlung rgyun lta bur bsngams //
translated: the voice is bound like a continuous wind.

original: sems ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: sems ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The mind is the nature of space.

original: dbyer med chos nyid kun gyi dngos //üîΩbrtan lus shing rta rab bcas pa //
analyzed: dbyer med chos nyid kun gyi dngos // brtan lus shing rta rab bcas pa //
translated: The inseparable reality is the entity of all.üîΩThe moving life-force is placed on the path.

original: g-yo ba srog shing lam du gzhug / de ltar bcings pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
analyzed: g-yo ba srog shing lam du gzhug / de ltar bcings pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
translated: The concentration that is bound in that way

original: 'chi med nam mkha'i dngos grub thob //
analyzed: 'chi med nam mkha'i dngos grub thob //
translated: And the attainment of immortality and space.

original: nam mkha'i rnal 'byor rnam mi rtog / yang dag lha ni bde ba che //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnal 'byor rnam mi rtog / yang dag lha ni bde ba che //
translated: The sky-yoga is non-conceptual, the perfect deity is great bliss.

original: de yi zung 'jug 'od gsal nyid //
analyzed: de yi zung 'jug 'od gsal nyid //
translated: Their union is luminosity.

original: gnas 'dir ngal ba so mkhas pa dag / rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: gnas 'dir ngal ba so mkhas pa dag / rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Here, the wise one, the vajra-holder, the vajra-holder,

original: rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje bde //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje bde //
translated: The vajra king, the vajra bliss,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpas stong //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpas stong //
translated: The vajra being, the being-emptiness,

original: ae ma rdo rje kun rig pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma rdo rje kun rig pa'o //
translated: Amazing! The vajra is all-knowing.

original: me tog mthong gi rtsi mi mthong //
analyzed: me tog mthong gi rtsi mi mthong //
translated: One sees the flower, not the tree.

original: chab rom mthong gi chu ma yin //
analyzed: chab rom mthong gi chu ma yin //
translated: One sees the ice, not the water.

original: lus mthong bde ba blang bar gyis //
analyzed: lus mthong bde ba blang bar gyis //
translated: Seeing the body, take up bliss.

original: sems mthong mthong ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems mthong mthong ba ma mchis so //
translated: Seeing the mind, see nothing.

original: chu nang skyes bus su yi bu //
analyzed: chu nang skyes bus su yi bu //
translated: In the water, whose child is the man?

original: rmi lam grong khyer bdag po med //
analyzed: rmi lam grong khyer bdag po med //
translated: In the dream, the city has no lord.

original: me long gzugs ni gang las 'ongs //
analyzed: me long gzugs ni gang las 'ongs //
translated: From where does the mirror's form come?

original: 'gro ba 'di kun de dang 'dra //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di kun de dang 'dra //
translated: All these beings are like that.

original: gang na gnas dang skye ba dang // 'gag 'gyur yul rgyu dus med pa //
analyzed: gang na gnas dang skye ba dang // 'gag 'gyur yul rgyu dus med pa //
translated: Where is the abiding, birth, and cessation? There is no place, cause, or time.

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid chos 'di la //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid chos 'di la //
translated: In this dharma with the characteristic of space,

original: kye ho 'jigs pa gang zhig yod //
analyzed: kye ho 'jigs pa gang zhig yod //
translated: Oh! What is there to fear?

original: 'di dag @177b snang ba snang brnyan tsam //
analyzed: 'di dag @177b snang ba snang brnyan tsam //
translated: These are mere appearances, mere reflections.

original: rig pa de yang rig pas dben //üîΩthams cad rig snyam shes snyam ste //
analyzed: rig pa de yang rig pas dben // thams cad rig snyam shes snyam ste //
translated: That awareness is also devoid of awareness.

original: tsam de la yang snyam nyid med //
analyzed: tsam de la yang snyam nyid med //
translated: Thinking ‚Äúeverything is awareness,‚Äù there is no thought even in that mere [awareness].

original: skyes bu don kun grub pa 'di //
analyzed: skyes bu don kun grub pa 'di //
translated: This person who has accomplished all goals

original: zhe sdang nyi ma 'od gsal lha //
analyzed: zhe sdang nyi ma 'od gsal lha //
translated: is the sun of anger, the deity of clear light.

original: 'dod chags zla ba bde bas spyod //
analyzed: 'dod chags zla ba bde bas spyod //
translated: The moon of desire is enjoyed with bliss.

original: gti mug sgra gcan mi rtog 'joms //
analyzed: gti mug sgra gcan mi rtog 'joms //
translated: Rahu of ignorance is conquered without concepts.

original: nam mkha'i sprin dang rgya mtsho'i rlabs //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sprin dang rgya mtsho'i rlabs //
translated: Clouds in the sky and waves in the ocean,

original: me tog rtsi dang ga bur dri //
analyzed: me tog rtsi dang ga bur dri //
translated: flowers, sap, and camphor scent,

original: me long gzugs dang shel dkar bzhin //
analyzed: me long gzugs dang shel dkar bzhin //
translated: mirrors, forms, and clear crystals‚Äî

original: rnam rtog mi rtog dngos dbyer med //
analyzed: rnam rtog mi rtog dngos dbyer med //
translated: concepts and non-conceptuality are inseparable.

original: 'gro ba 'di dag las las skyes //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di dag las las skyes //
translated: These beings are born from karma.

original: las ni nyon mongs de yi rgyu //
analyzed: las ni nyon mongs de yi rgyu //
translated: Karma arises from afflictions, which are in turn caused byüîΩsigns.

original: mtshan ma yin te de shes nas //
analyzed: mtshan ma yin te de shes nas //
translated: Knowing this,

original: skyes bu mtshan med rnam par grol //üîΩrtog pa'i glang chen lcags kyus dgug //
analyzed: skyes bu mtshan med rnam par grol // rtog pa'i glang chen lcags kyus dgug //
translated: the person is liberated from signs.üîΩThe elephant of concepts is guided with the hook.

original: sems kyi bung ba rtsi yis bsdu //
analyzed: sems kyi bung ba rtsi yis bsdu //
translated: The bee of mind is gathered with honey.

original: ting 'dzin dang po mtsho nang rtse //
analyzed: ting 'dzin dang po mtsho nang rtse //
translated: In the lake of the first samadhi, one plays.

original: shes rab padmo nyi zer 'byed //
analyzed: shes rab padmo nyi zer 'byed //
translated: The lotus of wisdom opens with the sun‚Äôs rays.

original: yid kyi mar mes mun pa sel //
analyzed: yid kyi mar mes mun pa sel //
translated: The lamp of the mind dispels darkness.

original: bde ba'i me tog bung bas 'jib //
analyzed: bde ba'i me tog bung bas 'jib //
translated: The bee drinks the flower of bliss.

original: 'dzin pa'i rba rlab rgya mtshor thim //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rba rlab rgya mtshor thim //
translated: The waves of grasping dissolve into the ocean.

original: bde sdug sprin de nam mkhar dengs //
analyzed: bde sdug sprin de nam mkhar dengs //
translated: The clouds of pleasure and pain vanish into space.

original: yi ge gsum gyi brdas mtshon pas ;
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyi brdas mtshon pas ;
translated: Symbolized by the three syllables,

original: yi ge med pa bdag gis rtogs //
analyzed: yi ge med pa bdag gis rtogs //
translated: I realize the absence of syllables.üîΩThe supreme syllable of the king of yoga

original: rnal 'byor rgyal po yi ge mchog / sems la gzhan ni ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyal po yi ge mchog / sems la gzhan ni ma mchis so //
translated: Is not elsewhere than the mind.

original: gang du 'gro med 'gro ba 'di //
analyzed: gang du 'gro med 'gro ba 'di //
translated: Where there is no going, this going

original: gnas zhes bya bar ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya bar ga la 'gyur //
translated: How can it be called a place?

original: gang mi gnas pa chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: gang mi gnas pa chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The nonabiding dharmadhƒÅtu

original: de la ji ltar 'gag 'gyur sems //
analyzed: de la ji ltar 'gag 'gyur sems //
translated: How can the mind be stopped there?

original: rtag tu byed bral gti mug med //
analyzed: rtag tu byed bral gti mug med //
translated: Always free of activity, without ignorance,

original: khro khro bag chags gtan bcom pa //
analyzed: khro khro bag chags gtan bcom pa //
translated: The latent tendencies of anger and aggression are utterly destroyed.

original: zhi ba'i dam pa mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: zhi ba'i dam pa mya ngan 'das //
translated: The supreme peace is nirvana.

original: gter chen rang la yod shes kyis //
analyzed: gter chen rang la yod shes kyis //
translated: Know that the great treasure exists within yourself.

original: 'jig rten sgyu ma'i las kyis bsgrubs //
analyzed: 'jig rten sgyu ma'i las kyis bsgrubs //
translated: Accomplishment is achieved through the illusion-like activity of the world.

original: sgyu ma sgyu ma'i yid kyis te //
analyzed: sgyu ma sgyu ma'i yid kyis te //
translated: Illusion is the illusory mind.

original: 'di kun sgyu ma nyid shes na //
analyzed: 'di kun sgyu ma nyid shes na //
translated: When all of this is known to be illusion,

original: sgyu ma lta bur rnam par grol //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur rnam par grol //
translated: One is liberated like an illusion.

original: sgyu mar rtogs pas bden rtog 'joms //
analyzed: sgyu mar rtogs pas bden rtog 'joms //
translated: By realizing it as illusion, the conception of true existence is destroyed.

original: rtog med sgyu ma la mi gnas //
analyzed: rtog med sgyu ma la mi gnas //
translated: Without conceptualization, one does not abide in illusion.

original: mi gnas 'gro la phan brtson pas //
analyzed: mi gnas 'gro la phan brtson pas //
translated: By not abiding, one strives to benefit beings.

original: ae ma nor bu rin chen rnyed /
analyzed: ae ma nor bu rin chen rnyed /
translated: Ema! I have found the precious gem!

original: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The Thirty-Two Realizations is completed.

original: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po mi tra dzo kyi de nyid kyi spyan sngar //
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po mi tra dzo kyi de nyid kyi spyan sngar //
translated: In the presence of the great lord of yogins, Mitrayogi,

original: gnubs lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: gnubs lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: the Tibetan translator, the one called Jampai Pal, translated this.
